verdict_reason: CRITICAL: Shadow data collection program has NOT been started. Zero weeks of data collected. All promotion gates FAIL.

shadow_log_jsonl.note: All entries from 2026-01-29 (today) - appears to be unit test data only

evidence_audit.evidence_conclusion: NO PRODUCTION SHADOW DATA EXISTS. Program not yet started.

gate_1_data_collection.requirement: ≥12 weeks shadow data collected (continuous, no major gaps)
gate_1_data_collection.evidence: No weekly_shadow_report_*.json files found. Shadow log contains only 114 test entries from today.

gate_2_positive_edge.requirement: Positive net-of-cost RL incremental edge consistently
gate_2_positive_edge.evidence: Cannot evaluate: no counterfactual evaluation data exists

gate_3_hit_rate.evidence: Cannot evaluate: no trading outcome data recorded

gate_4_sharpe.evidence: Cannot evaluate: no PnL data to calculate Sharpe ratio

gate_5_max_drawdown.requirement: Max drawdown <5% under counterfactual 'follow RL' scenarios
gate_5_max_drawdown.evidence: Cannot evaluate: no counterfactual scenarios recorded

gate_6_btc_mitigation.requirement: BTC mitigation validated OR BTC explicitly excluded from Phase 2C scope
gate_6_btc_mitigation.evidence: BTC turnover reduction implemented but not validated - no trading data

gate_7_human_signoff.evidence: Cannot request sign-off until all other gates pass

drift_and_safety_review.reason: No production data exists for drift or safety analysis

current_capital_preservation_state.note: Test state from manual trigger - not indicative of production behavior

remediation_tasks.priority_order: Sequential - each task depends on prior completion

tasks.description: Enable shadow collector in paper trading and begin actual trading with shadow logging

tasks.task: Run paper trading with shadow mode for 12+ weeks
tasks.description: Collect minimum 12 weeks of continuous shadow data with actual trading outcomes
tasks.verification: 12+ weekly_shadow_report_*.json files exist with valid data

tasks.description: Run run_weekly_shadow_report.py each week and review for positive edge
tasks.verification: Weekly reports show metrics, not N/A values

tasks.description: Analyze BTC-specific metrics using btc_diagnosis.py, confirm turnover reduced
tasks.verification: BTC degradation improved or BTC excluded from scope

tasks.description: Counterfactual analysis must show positive edge, hit rate ≥55%, Sharpe ≥0.3, DD <5%
Present complete evidence package to stakeholders for approval
tasks.timeline: After week 12 if all other gates pass

phase_2c_scope_proposal.reason: Cannot propose scope until all gates pass
phase_2c_scope_proposal.note: When gates pass, recommend starting with ETH-only, strategy selection advisory only

rollback_triggers.note: These triggers will apply once Phase 2C is approved

triggers.name: Daily loss threshold
triggers.action: Disable RL advisory, revert to baseline

triggers.name: Hit rate collapse
triggers.threshold: Hit rate drops below 45% over 2 weeks

triggers.name: Sharpe deterioration
triggers.threshold: Sharpe drops below 0.1 for 2 consecutive weeks

triggers.name: Turnover spike
triggers.threshold: >50% increase in daily trades vs baseline

triggers.name: Data integrity
triggers.threshold: Any missing shadow log entries or report generation failures

human_signoff_checklist.reason: Gates 1-6 must pass before requesting signoff
checklist_for_future: [ ] All weekly reports reviewed and archived
[ ] Positive RL edge in ≥10 of 12 weeks
[ ] Edge stable across multiple regimes (not just one)
[ ] BTC mitigation validated or BTC excluded
[ ] No critical alerts in past 4 weeks

next_steps: 1. IMMEDIATE: Start paper trading with shadow collector enabled
3. WEEKLY: Run run_weekly_shadow_report.py --week N and review
4. WEEK 12+: Re-run this gate evaluation with actual data
5. DO NOT attempt Phase 2C promotion until this evaluation passes

metadata.appeal_process: Re-run evaluation after 12+ weeks of data collection
